item.title: Cboe to launch new cash-settled bitcoin options
item.description: Traders will soon have another option for trading option contracts linked to the price of bitcoin.

item.title: Euro Risks Dropping to Parity Against Dollar as Economy Falters
item.description: The euro fell to a two-year low against the dollar and risks reaching parity, as concerns mount about the prospects for the eurozone economy.

item.title: Nvidia and the Magnificent Seven probably make up too much of your high-priced index fund, especially when the S&P 500 is this expensive
item.description: Also: Viking Therapeutics and a push to transform weight-loss treatment, bitcoin hits $100,000, and tips for filling out the federal student-aid form.
